poem.title: 'Tishe vody, nizhe travy' (Blok)
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Took the Scottish highers Like a deer fence, its Invigilated hush. The herd Hides in its numbers. Can't see The wood for marts and hinds, For venison and methane. It swarms on ruin, Hives and shingles of rugous bark, Verbal contract hires For trivial hits and highs.
